thread.title: Eminem Targets The American President Again, Calls Donald Trump 'A Bitch'
thread.title_full: Eminem Targets The American President Again, Calls Donald Trump 'A Bitch'

author: Aaditya Sharma
title: Eminem Targets The American President Again, Calls Donald Trump 'A Bitch'
text:
IN Celebrities ON 03 Feb, 2017 Eminem Targets The American President Again, Calls Donald Trump "A Bitch" Share on twitter Follow Us On 
Eminem is finally back, and he is back with another political anthem. He already has a history with the 'Presidents of the United States.' He has dissed George Bush, Bill Clinton, and presently he is after Donald Trump. 
He is known for his diss tracks, and his timing is always perfect. He has clearly stated that he does not like Donald Trump. During the Presidential Elections 2016, he dropped a highly political song called 'Campaign Speech' in which he dissed 15 celebrities including Donald Trump. 
Let us find what Eminem said to the United States Presidents in his songs. Eminem Targets The American President Again, Calls Donald Trump 'A Bitch' 754 396 
Eminem dissed Bill Clinton in his song Rap God . He referenced Bill Clinton's famous sex scandal with his secretary Monica Lewinsky where he said, "Ever since Bill Clinton was still in office with Monica Lewinsky feeling on his nutsack." Eminem dissed George Bush in his song Mosh. 
He went after George Bush with the protest song Mosh where he rapped "Stomp, push, shove, mush, F**k Bush." Eminem indirectly threatened Bush. via 
Slim Shady used his subliminal dissing capability and again went after George Bush in the rap song We as Americans . His rap was considered a threat to the President " F--k money/ I don't rap for dead Presidents, I'd rather see President dead, It's never been said, but I set precedents ." via 
Eminem dropped a highly political song named Campaign Speech during the U.S. presidential election dissing Trump and his supporters. This is how he attacked Trump "Consider me a dangerous man, but you should be afraid of this dang candidate. You say Trump don't kiss ass like a puppet, cause he runs his campaign with his own cash funding and that's what you wanted? A f***in loose canon who's blunt with his hand on the button." Eminem was not yet done via 
Big Sean released his " No Favors " song which features Eminem on 3rd February 2017, in this song Eminem again went after Trump. He rapped "I'm anti, can't no government handle a commando, Ya man don't want it, Trump's a Bitch I'll make his whole plan go down under." By this song he has made it clear that he will not back down against Trump. Listen to the song Campaign Speech below. 
Eminem is always ready for feuds and is not afraid either. It will be interesting to see if Slim Shady will go after Trump again in his upcoming album.
